The client issue can be duplicted in the geoshapes example:

Create to shapes and a line between them
In the appearance tab for the line, select the avoid obstructions checkbox.
The select the arrange all from the toolbar

Result: error ddialog and the exception

Looks like a focus problem - the action isn't getting the selection changed event and consequently the diagram is null.  Just on the surface the action shouldn't continue if it hasn't been retargetted...

I reproduced the problem with "select all". I decided to add a "select all" tool item right on the toolbar (i.e. not in a group). When I switched into the properties view from a diagram with shapes, the tool item was disabled, however, the "select all" in the select group remains enabled.
*** Bug 153917 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 153918 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=48049)
patch for AbstractActionHandler

Added part deactivated check which disables the action corresponding to the handler if the action contributes to the part being deactivated.
